text:
Message 3712 of 4024
I have asked directly and through attorneys these types of messages must stop.
Using OFW to send a message ridiculing my attorney and attacking my judgement is in violation of the TRO.
Besides the legal ramifications for these types of messages, perhaps reflect on why you felt the need to send this to me, and what you hoped to achieve
by sending this? I am not asking for an answer on this question but a suggestion for you to consider that might be insightful to you.
To be clear....Bless her heart.... You previously shared with me, this southern expression, and what it means truly when someone states this.
Sent:08/15/2024 at 06:09 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 08/15/2024 at 06:19 AM)
Subject:Please stop - An Oldie but a Goodie
Message 3713 of 4024
Wow. I apologize.
Like you said, we had discussed before and I saw it as I was cleaning stuff up. I thought we could have a giggle about it.
Understood.
Sent:08/15/2024 at 06:26 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/15/2024 at 11:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Please stop - An Oldie but a Goodie
Message 3714 of 4024
Six months ago
Sent:08/15/2024 at 06:54 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/15/2024 at 11:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Yesterday
Message 3715 of 4024
I'll ignore when you do it ... and point taken, let's just get along. Hope you have a nice day.
Your very expensive lawyer suggested an RO against me for an app you insisted I install and use at your request. She instructed you to rent a 7k home
with no employment and after annual income drops to 1/5 of what it was before. The original parenting plan she drafted was so restrictive you
ignored it.
Sent:08/15/2024 at 10:52 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/15/2024 at 11:18 AM)
Subject:Re: Please stop - An Oldie but a Goodie
